sentences.en: Catherine was ready to explode. "I think you're contemptible!"
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳气得快要炸了。“我觉得你真是可鄙！”

sentences.en: Edward's taste was contemptible in books, in pictures and in music.
sentences.cn: 爱德华对于书本 、 图画和音乐欣赏趣味是低贱的.

sentences.en: He is ever contemptible and uninterruptedly ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 他永远低贱,无时不可笑.

sentences.en: He must have a very contemptible opinion of her capacities.
sentences.cn: 他一定看不起她的能力.

sentences.en: His life is a logical result of his opinions, and mine is a contemptible non sequitur.
sentences.cn: 他的一生是他的观点的合理的结果, 而我的一生却自相矛盾,令人鄙视.

sentences.en: His personal presence is unimpressive and his speech contemptible.
How can you bear to be so contemptible, when others are working and striving?
sentences.cn: 别人都在工作和努力,你怎么能满不在乎, 不怕给人瞧不起 呢 ?

sentences.en: I've very good mind to shake you severely, for your contemptible treachery, and your imbecile conceit.
sentences.cn: 我 倒 想狠狠地摇撼你, 就因为你的可鄙的奸诈, 和你那低能的奇想.

sentences.en: It was a contemptible trick to tell lies and play on an old friend!
sentences.cn: 说谎耍弄老朋友是卑鄙伎俩!

sentences.en: It was contemptible of him to speak like that about a respectable teacher!
sentences.cn: 他这样议论一位受人尊敬的教师真是为人所不齿!

sentences.en: It was humiliating that he did so ill something which seemed contemptible.
sentences.cn: 让他做这些在他看来是无聊的事儿,而且他还干得很不好,这真是莫大耻辱.

sentences.en: Its color and design are marvelous; its drawing contemptible.
sentences.cn: 它的颜色和图案是惊人的, 它的图画却很无聊.

sentences.en: That was a contemptible trick to play on a friend.
sentences.cn: 那是对朋友玩弄的一出可鄙的把戏.

sentences.en: The members censured him since he had done a very contemptible thing.
sentences.cn: 因为他做了一件很可鄙的事情,会员们都责难他.

sentences.en: They were portrayed as contemptible cowards.
sentences.cn: 他们被刻画成可鄙的胆小鬼。

sentences.en: To me, all these spontaneous responses of his were contemptible and despicable.
sentences.cn: 他的这些,在我看来都是笑柄,可鄙的.

trans.tran_en: not deserving any respect at all
